text: Max Azria (Hebrew: מקס עזריה; Arabic: ماكس عزرية) (January 1, 1949 - May 6, 2019) was a Tunisian-American fashion designer. == Biography == He founded the contemporary women's clothing brand BCBGMAXAZRIA. Azria was also the designer, chairman and CEO of the BCBG Max Azria Group.Mustafa, Nadia (Fall 2006). "Bon Business", Time Style & Design, 81. He was born Sfax, Tunisia. Azria died on May 6, 2019 in Houston, Texas from lung cancer at the age of 70.Max Azria Dead at 70 ==References== ==Other websites== * Official BCBG Max Azria website Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Texas Category:Tunisian businesspeople Category:American fashion designers Category:Fashion designers Category:People from Tunis
title: Max Azria
